main.name: David Dobbins
main.description: I have over 8 years of experience as a Software Engineer. Primarily focused in C# but also capable in React , Cloud and DevOps
main.bio: I am a hard working problem solver. I love learning and improving myself and my skills. I am the linchpin of every project I am a part of. I give 100% all of the time. When I am not working I enjoy spending time with my family, exploring the outdoors, hiking, and riding bikes.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Along with my hard skills, I have soft skills in communicating clearly with teammates and clients. I am easy to work with and I adapt quickly to changes.

education.description: Graduated with Highest Honors, Learned essential skills for Software Development.
Graduated with a General Diploma one year early.

work.title: Senior Engineer
work.tech: C#, SQL, Redis, Clean Architecture, Azure , Docker
work.description: Lead a team of 6 Backend Engineers on a application rewrite project. Lead project application Expert. Implemented Design patterns and best practices. Setup and Manage Azure Infrastructure. Configured CI/CD Azure DevOps build and release pipelines. Collaborate with Frontend and Design

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.tech: C#, React, SQL, MongoDB, Kentico, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes
work.description: Create a kentico B2B application consisting of a web api, react front end , and microservice api. Small Collaborative team. Supported Production application as well as adding new feature sets.

work.title: Software Engineer (.Net)
work.tech: C#, React, SQL, MongoDB, Kentico, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes
work.description: Working with Client to create B2B app in .Net, Kentico, React(typescript),Azure.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Creating Development Tools, building and maintaining Windows Services. Creating custom workflow actions for clients.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Multiple DotNetNuke Websites in VB.Net, JS, and SQL. Desktop applications using VB.Net, and WPF. SQL. As well as General IT work

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
